changeSet.author: araskhanyan
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `user` ( `id` bigint NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `surname` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `email` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `password` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `phone_number` int(11), `role` enum('ADMIN','USER') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'USER', `image` varchar(255), `location` varchar(255), PRIMARY KEY (`id`) )

CREATE TABLE `ads` ( `id` bigint NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `date_time` date NOT NULL, `car_make` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT NULL, `car_model` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci DEFAULT NULL, `car_year` date DEFAULT NULL, `car_price` double DEFAULT NULL, `description` text, `user_id` bigint NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`, `user_id`), KEY `user_id` (`user_id`), CONSTRAINT `ads_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `user` (`id`) )

CREATE TABLE `favourites` ( `ads_id` bigint NOT NULL, `user_id` bigint NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ads_id`, `user_id`), KEY `user_id` (`user_id`), CONSTRAINT `favourites_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `user` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `favourites_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`ads_id`) REFERENCES `ads` (`id`) )

CREATE TABLE `images` ( `id` bigint NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `image_path` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `ads_id` bigint NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`, `ads_id`), KEY `ads_id` (`ads_id`), CONSTRAINT `images_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`ads_id`) REFERENCES `ads` (`id`) )

CREATE TABLE `currency` ( `id` bigint NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `usd` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `rub` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
)
